Team

Home Safe Termite & Pest Company employs only trained and certified WDI Inspectors and Treatment Specialists. All of our team members go through extensive and continual training in the latest techniques and issues surrounding wood destroying insects and the treatment of current or past infestations.

HOME SAFE TERMITE & PEST COMPANY is an affiliate and partner of Parperty Condition Consulting, LLC., and is based in Rowlett, TX. We proudly serve the residents of the Dallas and surrounding counties.
